form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa

full_text: Screened by NARA 9/22/2023 UNITED. STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE A 21 43106, RCSEI and Naturalization Service Form-approved OMB No. 43-RO401 PETITION TO APR 9 Date filed Fee stamp CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR NATURALIZATION THONOLULU SERVICE IMMIGRATION AND 197-71 ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on Remarks The petition Is approved for status under section: U.S. APPROVED INS SPOUSE, 203 (a) (2) DATE APR 10 1975 201 (b) CHILD OF 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) DISTRICT DD ACTION for HONOLULU, F.OSies HAWAII 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) office notified by 4/14/75 tel 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block 1. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3. Do Not Write in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner Father BUI Nga Quang 6. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? 5. Other names used; (including maidan name if married woman) VAN NGOC no 9. Beneficiary's marital status: 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) VIETNAM Dec 31st 1915 Married Widowed Divorced Single 12. Has this beneficiary ever been In the U.S.? 10. Petitioner's name (Last, In CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. Petitioner's phone JOHNSON Therese W. (808)261-2942 Yes No 13. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) TRAN THI DANG April 1920 - Vietnam 14. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, If any See enclosed list 15. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, If any (Omit this Item if petition is for your spouse) See enclosed list 16. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages c. Number of prior marriages of spouse N/A N/A N/A d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt.No.) (Number and street) AT (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) Kailua Hawaii U.S.A. 1619 Ulupii P1. May 74 Present 17. If this petition Is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b). Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. NONE 18. if this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner. See enclosed list 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? no If so, give place and date of filing and result. FO RM I-130 RECEI) ED TRANS IN RET'D-TRANS OUT COMPLETED (REV. 2.1.74) Y
